BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.checker.ShardingTableRuleStatementChecker.createToBeCheckedShardingRuleConfiguration(ShardingRuleConfiguration) excessively uses methods of another class

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.checker.ShardingTableRuleStatementChecker.getShardingColumn(ShardingStrategyConfiguration, String) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.checker.ShardingTableRuleStatementChecker.checkStrategy(String, Collection) makes literal string comparisons passing the literal as an argument

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.checker.ShardingTableRuleStatementChecker.checkStrategy(String, Collection) makes literal string comparisons passing the literal as an argument
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.converter.ShardingTableRuleStatementConverter.convert(Collection) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.enums.ShardingStrategyType.lambda$getValueOf$0(ShardingStrategyConfiguration, ShardingStrategyType) compares class name instead of comparing the class
Enum class org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.enums.ShardingStrategyType only declares one enum value
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.enums.ShardingStrategyType.getValueOf(String) throws alternative exception from catch block without history

org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.query.ShowDefaultShardingStrategyExecutor.buildData(ShardingRule): 1st parameter 'rule' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.rule.ShardingSphereRule instead

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.query.ShowShardingAlgorithmExecutor.getRows(ShardingSphereDatabase, ShowShardingAlgorithmsStatement) uses immediate execution of a block of code that is often not used

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.query.ShowShardingAuditorsExecutor.getRows(ShardingSphereDatabase, ShowShardingAuditorsStatement) uses immediate execution of a block of code that is often not used
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.query.ShowShardingTableRuleExecutor.getShardingColumn(ShardingStrategyConfiguration) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.query.ShowShardingTableRulesUsedAlgorithmExecutor.requireResult(ShowShardingTableRulesUsedAlgorithmStatement, Collection, ShardingRule): 3rd parameter 'rule' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.rule.ShardingSphereRule instead

org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.query.ShowShardingTableRulesUsedAuditorExecutor.requireResult(ShowShardingTableRulesUsedAuditorStatement, Collection, ShardingRule): 3rd parameter 'rule' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.rule.ShardingSphereRule instead

org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.query.ShowShardingTableRulesUsedKeyGeneratorExecutor.requireResult(ShowShardingTableRulesUsedKeyGeneratorStatement, Collection, ShardingRule): 3rd parameter 'rule' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.rule.ShardingSphereRule instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.update.AbstractDropShardingRuleUpdater.dropUnusedAlgorithm(ShardingRuleConfiguration) excessively uses methods of another class

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.distsql.handler.update.CreateDefaultShardingStrategyStatementUpdater.updateCurrentRuleConfiguration(ShardingRuleConfiguration, ShardingRuleConfiguration) excessively uses methods of another class
